snippet.title: Hollywood Animal — Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Add to Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2680550/Hollywood_Animal/

Hollywood Animal is coming on Steam in 2024.

Make your dreams come true – or crush someone else’s. Take the helm of a major Hollywood studio at the dawn of sound cinema, and guide it through decades of creative achievements and glamor, debauchery and dark deeds, tough choices and unpleasant compromises. In this cruel business, the law of survival is the only one that matters.


Check news on Twitter: https://twitter.com/WeappyStudio
Subscribe to our YouTube channel: https://youtube.com/@WeappyStudio

#hollywoodanimal #hollywoodanimalgame #hagame #Weappy #steam #thisisthepolice #titp
